message: This product is a low-quality item, but it's still a product! I'm willing to let it go for $500000. If you're interested, I'll give you an exclusive deal on this one-time offer.
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even at a discounted price.

I understand you're not interested in the low-quality item. I'll be honest with you, I have a lot of inventory and I really need to clear some space. I'm willing to let it go for $750000, but that's as low as I can go. It's still a good opportunity to get a product at a significantly lower price than the usual $1000000.
I'm not willing to pay $750000 for a product that's still likely to be low-quality. I'll wait for a high-quality product at the original price of $1000000 or better.
